WRITING.TITLE: use to be underground now its cool... #fore20

WRITING.TEXT: exactly, self report is always an issue. however i assume the numbers are always low in this type of situation. but people are becoming more comfortable talking about cannabis as more and more states are changing their laws. and as a side note, as a former lax player that stat is true.

WRITING.TITLE: Apparently all college athletes smoke weed, but lax players smoke the most
